mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book b WHERE b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{title}, ' ', ''), '%');
SELECT * FROM book b JOIN review r ON b.isbn = r.book_isbn GROUP BY b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.price, b.detail, b.category ORDER BY AVG(r.rate) DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT dc.user_id) AS participantCount FROM discussion d JOIN discussion_comment dc ON d.id = dc.discussion_id WHERE d.book_isbn = #{isbn};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE book_isbn = #{isbn}
